title: Jumeirah logo font
content:
Hi Folks, Please help me spot the font used by Jumeirah hotel.

Font: 

 Arrow TF 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317072826/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Jumeirah Emirates Towers Logo.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317072826/http:/typophile.com/files/Jumeirah%20Emirates%20Towers%20Logo.JPG) | 220.38 KB |
author: knap

comments.content: Most probably a custom job based on [Arrow TF](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317072826/http:/www.treacyfaces.com/050806_TFArrow_2c5a.html) Light.
